articles.title: 1X struck a deal to send its ‘home’ humanoids to factories and warehouses
articles.description: Despite launching as a humanoid robot designed to help consumers around the house, 1X's Neo robots are heading to industrial use cases.

articles.title: The market has ‘switched’ and founders have the power now, VCs say
articles.description: Graham & Walker’s Leslie Feinzaig and XYZ Venture’s Ross Fubini share the secrets for founders — and VCs — to make the most of the current fast
articles.author: Isabelle Johannessen, Maggie Nye

articles.title: Epic Games’ Fortnite is back in US Google Play Store, as court partially reverses restrictions it won on iOS
articles.description: The game is back on the Google Play Store, but another court decision is rolling back some of the developer-friendly changes on iOS.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Disney hits Google with cease-and-desist claiming ‘massive’ copyright infringement
articles.description: Disney is accusing the tech giant of unauthorized distribution of its copyrighted characters without permission via Gemini AI.
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: Google’s AI try-on feature for clothes now works with just a selfie
articles.description: In the past, users had to upload a full-body picture of themselves to virtually try on a piece of clothing. Now they can use a selfie and Nano Banana

articles.title: Google debuts ‘Disco,’ a Gemini-powered tool for making web apps from browser tabs
articles.description: Google Labs is testing a product that will work with your browser tabs to make web apps for you.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Rivian’s AI assistant is coming to its EVs in early 2026

articles.title: Runway releases its first world model, adds native audio to latest video model
articles.description: Runway debuts a physics-aware world model that simulates reality to train agents and power video, robotics, and avatar applications.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta, Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: Ford and SK On are ending their US battery joint venture
articles.description: The factories live on; the joint venture will not. The two companies will divide the assets: Ford will take ownership and operation of the twin
articles.author: Kirsten Korosec

articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: Security flaws in Freedom Chat app exposed users’ phone numbers and PINs
articles.description: The founder of Freedom Chat said the company has reset user PINs and released a new version to app stores.

articles.title: Interest in Spoor’s bird-monitoring AI software is soaring
articles.description: Spoor's computer vision software can help wind farms, and other industries, track bird populations and migration patterns.

articles.title: Eclipse Energy’s microbes can turn idle oil wells into hydrogen factories
articles.description: The biotech startup is betting that owners of abandoned oil wells will use the tech to squeeze energy out of their wells.

articles.title: Baby delivered in Waymo continues proud tradition of not making it to the hospital
articles.description: Some traditions, it seems, are immune to disruption.

articles.title: Google’s answer to the AI arms race — promote the guy behind its data center tech
articles.description: Amin Vahdat has been promoted to chief technologist for AI infrastructure, a newly created position reporting directly to CEO Sundar Pichai.

articles.title: State attorneys general warn Microsoft, OpenAI, Google, and other AI giants to fix ‘delusional’ outputs
articles.description: The letter demanded companies institute new safeguards to keep users safe from harmful psychological impacts.
